AERIAL SERVANT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can be hit only by magic weapons, Invisibility
AERIAL SERVANT.DESCRIPTION: A non-corporeal elemental creature summoned by powerful magic, typically appearing as an invisible whirlwind that serves its summoner.

ANHKHEG.DESCRIPTION: A large, burrowing insectoid monster known for its powerful bite and ability to spit corrosive acid.

ANT, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Warriors have a poison sting (3-12 damage, save for 1-4)
ANT, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: Massive, aggressive insects that travel in dangerous colonies, often capable of overwhelming targets with sheer numbers.

APE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Rending: If it hits with both hands, it does an additional 1-6 damage.
APE.DESCRIPTION: A large, strong primate found in jungles and wild areas, usually neutral but aggressive if disturbed.

AXEBEAK.DESCRIPTION: A tall, flightless, ostrich-like bird with a sharp, heavy beak, known for its speed and territorial aggression.

BABOON.DESCRIPTION: A common, intelligent primate that often attacks in noisy, overwhelming packs.

BADGER.DESCRIPTION: A small, fierce digging mammal that, when giant, poses a significant threat with its teeth and claws.

BALUCHITHERIUM.DESCRIPTION: An enormous, extinct rhinoceros-like mammal, one of the largest land creatures, highly dangerous when angered.

BARRACUDA.DESCRIPTION: A large, predatory fish with sharp teeth and an aggressive nature, known for fast, sudden attacks.

BASILISK.DESCRIPTION: A reptile known for its deadly gaze that can turn victims to stone and its venomous bite.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

BEAR.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Hug: If a bear scores a paw hit with an 18 or better it also hugs for additional damage (2-8 to 2-16).
BEAR.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Brown and cave bears continue to fight for 1-4 rounds after reaching 0 to -8 hit points.
BEAR.DESCRIPTION: A powerful, omnivorous mammal, often aggressive, including black, brown, and polar varieties.

BEAVER, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: An unusually large version of the common aquatic rodent, capable of felling large trees and building massive dams.

BEETLE, GIANT.TREASURE TYPE: Nil (Boring Beetle: C, R, S, T)
BEETLE, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Bombardier: Acid cloud. Fire: None. Boring: None. Rhinoceros: None. Stag: None. Water: None.
BEETLE, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: Massive insects of various types (e.g., Bombardier, Fire, Rhinoceros), often used as mounts or threats in dungeons.

BEHOLDER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Magic: 10 small eyes on top stalks, each with a different spell-like function (Charm Person, Charm Monster, Sleep, Telekinesis, Flesh to Stone, Disintegrate, Fear, Slow, Cause Serious Wounds, Death Ray).
BEHOLDER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Anti-magic ray from central eye projects a 14" cone of anti-magic.
BEHOLDER.DESCRIPTION: A terrifying, spherical creature with one central eye and numerous eyestalks, each projecting a different magical power.

BLACK PUDDING.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Dissolves wood and metal: Corrodes chainmail in 1 round, plate mail in 2. Can flow through small cracks.
BLACK PUDDING.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to cold and lightning. Blows from weapons break it into smaller parts, each able to attack.
BLACK PUDDING.MAGIC RESISTANCE: Immune to spells except for fire which causes normal damage.
BLACK PUDDING.DESCRIPTION: A massive, mobile, black glob of corrosive ooze that dissolves organic and metal substances alike.

BLINK DOG.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Teleportation ('Blinking') at will, appears 1-3' from opponent.
BLINK DOG.DESCRIPTION: A dog-like creature with the ability to teleport short distances (blink) as part of its attack and defense maneuvers.

BOAR.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Fights for 1-2 rounds after reaching 0 to -6 hit points
BOAR.DESCRIPTION: A wild swine known for its relentless, charging attacks and tusks.

BRAIN MOLE.DESCRIPTION: A subterranean mammal known for burrowing into the skulls of victims and consuming their brains.

BROWNIE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Spells: protection from evil, ventriloquism, dancing lights, continual light, mirror image, confusion, and dimension door, once per day.
BROWNIE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Save as 9th level cleric, never surprised, can become invisible.
BROWNIE.DESCRIPTION: A helpful, tiny humanoid creature from folklore, known for performing chores in exchange for small gifts.

BUFFALO.DESCRIPTION: A large, powerful herd animal, usually peaceful but extremely dangerous when stampeding or protecting its young.

BUGBEAR.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals J, K, L, M; B in lair
BUGBEAR.DESCRIPTION: A large, hairy, goblinoid creature known for its stealth and preference for ambushes.

BULETTE.DESCRIPTION: A large, plated monster known as the ‘land shark’ due to its ability to leap out of the ground and devour targets.

BULL.DESCRIPTION: A powerful male bovine known for its charging attack and sheer physical strength.

CAMEL, WILD.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Spitting: 50% chance to spit, 25% chance of blinding for 1-3 rounds.
CAMEL, WILD.DESCRIPTION: An aggressive, unruly variety of camel found in deserts, capable of spitting foul substances.

CARRION CRAWLER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Paralyzing touch from its 8 tentacles, save vs. paralyzation or be paralyzed.
CARRION CRAWLER.DESCRIPTION: A horrific, segmented scavenger with multiple paralyzing tentacles and an appetite for rotting flesh.

CATOBLEPAS.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Gaze causes death, save vs. death ray to avoid.
CATOBLEPAS.DESCRIPTION: A sluggish, swamp-dwelling beast whose foul breath or gaze can cause death or paralysis.

CATTLE, WILD.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Stampede: 25% chance to stampede, trampling causes 1-4 damage per creature.
CATTLE, WILD.DESCRIPTION: Feral cows or oxen, capable of trampling threats when encountered in large numbers.

CENTAUR.TREASURE TYPE: M, Q, with each; D, I, T in lair
CENTAUR.DESCRIPTION: A creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse, usually peaceful forest dwellers.

CENTIPEDE, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Poison: save vs. poison at +4 or not fatal, but causes intense pain.
CENTIPEDE, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A monstrously large insect with a venomous bite that often delivers painful, paralytic poison.

CEREBRAL PARASITE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Infestation: Drains psionic energy when abilities are used.
CEREBRAL PARASITE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Not harmed except by cure disease
CEREBRAL PARASITE.DESCRIPTION: A small, worm-like creature that burrows into the brains of living hosts to control and feed on them.

CHIMERA.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Breath weapon: Dragon head can breathe fire (50% chance) for 3-24 damage.
CHIMERA.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous hybrid creature with the heads of a goat, a lion, and a dragon, often capable of breathing fire.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

COCKATRICE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Touch turns to stone, save vs. petrification to avoid.
COCKATRICE.DESCRIPTION: A small, magical bird whose touch or bite can instantly turn a living creature to stone.

COUATL.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Poison, magic use (5th level magic-user and/or 7th level cleric), Constriction
COUATL.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful, winged serpent, highly intelligent, benevolent, and often possessing powerful magical abilities.

CRAB, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: Massive crustaceans found near water, capable of crushing foes with their large claws.

CRAYFISH, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: Large, freshwater lobsters that inhabit rivers and lakes, known for their powerful, snapping pincers.

CROCODILE.DESCRIPTION: A large, scaly, amphibious reptile found in tropical waters, known for its death roll attack.

DEMON.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Darkness, Teleportation, Gate, and others depending on type.
DEMON.DESCRIPTION: A chaotic evil outsider from the Abyss, possessing immense power and representing various forms of corruption and destruction.

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

DEVIL.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Charm Person, Suggestion, Illusion, Infravision, Teleportation, Know Alignment, Cause Fear, Animate Dead, and others depending on type.
DEVIL.DESCRIPTION: A lawful evil outsider from the Nine Hells, focused on corruption, deals, and strict hierarchical evil.

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

DINOSAUR.DESCRIPTION: Any of a variety of large, primeval reptiles (e.g., Tyrannosaurus, Triceratops), ranging from herbivores to apex predators.

DISPLACER BEAST.SPECIAL DEFENSES: -2 on opponent's attack dice, Save as 12th level fighter +2 on die
DISPLACER BEAST.DESCRIPTION: A feline predator with two tentacles on its shoulders, constantly surrounded by an illusion that makes it appear to be a few feet from its actual location.

DJINNI.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Create food, water, wine, soft goods, wooden items, metal items, illusion, become invisible, assume gaseous form, wind walk, or form a whirlwind.
DJINNI.DESCRIPTION: A benevolent elemental spirit of air, often powerful, intelligent, and capable of granting limited wishes.

DOG.DESCRIPTION: A common domesticated canine, ranging from loyal companions to dangerous feral hunters.

DOLPHIN.DESCRIPTION: An intelligent, friendly aquatic mammal, highly valued for its helpful nature and ability to communicate.

DOPPLEGANGER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Save as 10th level fighter, immune to sleep and charm spells.
DOPPLEGANGER.DESCRIPTION: A cunning humanoid creature capable of magically assuming the appearance and voice of any person it chooses.

DRAGON.DESCRIPTION: A massive, scaled reptilian creature of immense power, intelligence, and magical ability, typically categorized by color.

DRAGONNE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Roar: causes weakness unless save vs. paralysis, deafens those within 30' for 2-12 rounds.
DRAGONNE.DESCRIPTION: A powerful beast that is a cross between a great cat and a dragon, but lacks the dragon’s intelligence and magical breath.

DRAGON TURTLE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Breath weapon: Cloud of scalding steam 6" long, 4" wide, 4" high.
DRAGON TURTLE.DESCRIPTION: A colossal, amphibious reptile resembling a turtle with draconic features, inhabiting deep seas and often demanding tribute from passing ships.

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

DRYAD.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Charm person spell at -3 to save, three times per day.
DRYAD.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful female spirit tied to a specific tree, which dies if the tree is destroyed, known for charming travelers.

DWARF.DESCRIPTION: A short, stout humanoid race known for their skill in mining, stonework, and craftsmanship.

EAGLE, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Dive: +4 to hit, double claw damage, no beak attack.
EAGLE, GIANT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Never surprised unless in lair or at night.
EAGLE, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: An enormous bird of prey often used as a majestic mount or powerful ally in high mountain ranges.

EAR SEEKER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Burrows into ear to reach and eat brain.
EAR SEEKER.DESCRIPTION: A tiny, flying parasitic creature that attempts to burrow into the ear canal to reach the brain.

EEL.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Electric: Jolt for 3-24 (within 5'), 2-16 (5-10'), 1-8 (10-15'). Weed: Poison bite.
EEL.SIZE: M (9' long), M (20' long), S (6' long)
EEL.DESCRIPTION: A snake-like fish, including electric varieties, capable of delivering a shocking jolt.

EFREETI.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Produce flame, pyrotechnics, grant up to three wishes, become invisible, assume gaseous form, detect magic, enlarge, polymorph self, create an illusion, create a wall of fire.
EFREETI.DESCRIPTION: A malicious elemental spirit of fire, known for its immense size, fiery appearance, and aggressive nature.

ELEMENTAL.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Air: Whirlwind. Earth: Full damage to creatures on the ground. Fire: Sets fire to inflammable materials. Water: Full effect in water, can upset small craft.
ELEMENTAL.DESCRIPTION: A creature composed entirely of one of the four classic elements: Air, Earth, Fire, or Water.

ELEPHANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, powerful, intelligent terrestrial mammal, usually gentle but dangerous when enraged or threatened.

ELF.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals N; G, S, T in lair
ELF.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Move silently and blend into vegetation to become invisible.
ELF.DESCRIPTION: A tall, graceful, long-lived humanoid race known for their connection to nature and magic.

ETTIN.TREASURE TYPE: Individual O, C, Y in lair
ETTIN.DESCRIPTION: A large, two-headed giant known for its low intelligence and perpetual squabbling between its heads.

EYE, FLOATING.DESCRIPTION: A magical, detached eyeball that drifts through the air, often used as a scout or alarm by powerful wizards.

EYE OF THE DEEP.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Central eye flash stuns for 2-8 rounds (save vs. death ray). Two smaller eyes can cast illusion, hold person, or hold monster.
EYE OF THE DEEP.DESCRIPTION: A large, terrifying aquatic Beholder relative that guards deep sea tunnels and treasures.

FLIGHTLESS BIRD.DESCRIPTION: Various large, terrestrial birds (e.g., giant ostriches) that rely on speed and powerful kicks for defense.

FROG, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Tongue attack at +4 to hit to draw prey to mouth; Swallow whole on a score of 20 (Frog, Giant). Talons and teeth (Killer). Poisonous skin and bite (Poisonous).
FROG, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A large, amphibious jumper with a long, sticky tongue capable of pulling victims into its massive maw.

FUNGI, VIOLET.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Secretion rots flesh in one round unless a save vs. poison is made or cure disease is used.
FUNGI, VIOLET.DESCRIPTION: A type of mobile, sentient fungus that attempts to lash out and paralyze victims with its tendrils.

GAR, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Swallow whole on a score of 20.
GAR, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, predatory freshwater fish with long, toothed jaws, found in large rivers and lakes.

GARGOYLE.DESCRIPTION: A magical, winged creature sculpted from stone, known for blending in with architecture and ambushing passersby.

GAS SPORE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Explodes if hit for 1 point, dealing 6-36 damage to creatures within 20'. Shoots rhizomes into flesh on contact, causing death in 24 hours unless cured.
GAS SPORE.DESCRIPTION: A floating orb that looks exactly like a Beholder but is actually a fragile fungus that explodes upon impact, releasing deadly spores.

GELATINOUS CUBE.TREASURE TYPE: J, K, L, M, N, Q, plus a potion or dagger
GELATINOUS CUBE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Paralyzation, surprise on 1-3. Anesthetizes for 5-20 rounds unless a save vs. paralyzation is made.
GELATINOUS CUBE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to electricity, fear, holds, paralyzation, polymorph, and sleep-based attacks. Cold does half or no damage.
GELATINOUS CUBE.DESCRIPTION: A large, transparent, amorphous ooze that silently glides through dungeons, dissolving organic matter and trapping treasure within its body.

GHAST.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Paralyzing touch affects elves. Carrion stench in a 10' radius causes -2 'to hit' penalty unless save vs. poison is made.
GHAST.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to sleep and charm spells. Cold iron causes double damage.
GHAST.DESCRIPTION: A more powerful, stench-ridden form of ghoul whose touch can paralyze victims.

GHOST.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Sight causes aging and panic. Can cast magic jar at will.
GHOST.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can only be struck by silver (50% damage) or magical weapons. Can become ethereal.
GHOST.MAGIC RESISTANCE: Immune to spells from non-ethereal creatures.
GHOST.DESCRIPTION: The spectral, non-corporeal remnant of a deceased person, usually bound by strong emotion or an unfinished task.

GHOUL.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Paralyzing touch, does not affect elves.
GHOUL.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to sleep and charm spells.
GHOUL.DESCRIPTION: An undead humanoid that feeds on flesh, usually possessing a paralytic touch.

GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A huge, humanoid creature of immense strength, categorized into various types (e.g., Hill, Stone, Cloud, Frost).

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

GNOLL.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals L, M; D, Q (x5), S in lair
GNOLL.DESCRIPTION: A hyena-headed, vicious humanoid race known for their raiding, scavenging, and cruelty.

GNOME.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals M (x3); C, Q (x20) in lair
GNOME.SPECIAL ATTACKS: +1 to hit vs. kobolds and goblins.
GNOME.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Save at 4 levels higher. +1 on saves vs. magic and poison.
GNOME.DESCRIPTION: A small, industrious humanoid race known for their love of inventions, intricate mechanics, and gems.

GOAT, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A monstrously large version of the common caprine, dangerous for its massive, charging head-butts.

GOBLIN.DESCRIPTION: A small, green-skinned, malicious humanoid race, known for their large numbers and cowardice.

GOLEM.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Clay: Haste. Flesh: Berserk. Iron: Poison gas. Stone: Slow spell.
GOLEM.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immunity to most spells and normal weapons.
GOLEM.DESCRIPTION: An artificial creature constructed from various materials (e.g., clay, stone, iron) and animated by elemental spirit or magic.

GORGON.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Breath turns to stone, save vs. petrification to avoid.
GORGON.DESCRIPTION: A massive, iron-plated bull whose breath can turn victims to stone (petrify them).

GRAY OOZE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to spells, heat, and cold. Lightning causes full damage.
GRAY OOZE.DESCRIPTION: A type of amorphous creature that corrodes metal, often lurking silently in stagnant pools.

GREEN SLIME.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Turns creature into green slime in 1-4 rounds. Eats away wood and metal.
GREEN SLIME.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can be scraped off, excised, frozen, or burned. Immune to other attacks.
GREEN SLIME.DESCRIPTION: A dangerous, creeping mold that instantly dissolves flesh and is immune to most weapons, requiring fire to destroy.

GRIFFON.DESCRIPTION: A magnificent hybrid creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle, often used as a noble mount.

GROANING SPIRIT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Keening causes death for those within 30' who fail a save vs. magic.
GROANING SPIRIT.DESCRIPTION: A type of terrifying female ghost (Banshee) whose wailing can instantly cause death.

HALFLING.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Save at 4 levels higher. Surprise opponents on 1-4. Invisibility in natural terrain.
HALFLING.DESCRIPTION: A small, nimble humanoid race known for their love of comfort, good food, and surprising luck.

HARPY.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Singing & charm: Lures victims closer unless a save vs. magic is made. Touch charms creatures that fail a save vs. magic.
HARPY.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous creature with the body of a vulture and the upper torso of a woman, known for enchanting sailors with its song.

HELL HOUND.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Breathe fire for damage equal to its hit dice (save for half).
HELL HOUND.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Surprised only on 1, see invisible objects 50% of the time.
HELL HOUND.DESCRIPTION: A dog-like creature from the lower planes, capable of breathing fire and relentless tracking.

HERD ANIMAL.DESCRIPTION: Generic term for large, non-aggressive mammals (like deer or antelope) that travel in groups.

HIPPOCAMPUS.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful marine creature with the front quarters of a horse and the tail of a fish, sometimes ridden by tritons.

HIPPOGRIFF.DESCRIPTION: A magnificent hybrid creature with the front quarters of an eagle and the body of a horse, often used as a swift, loyal mount.

HIPPOPOTAMUS.DESCRIPTION: A large, semi-aquatic mammal, highly territorial and aggressive when its space is invaded.

HOBGOBLIN.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals J, M, D, Q (x5) in lair
HOBGOBLIN.DESCRIPTION: A larger, more disciplined, and militaristic cousin of the goblin, highly organized in warfare.

HOMUNCULUS.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Bite causes sleep (save vs. magic or fall asleep for 5-30 minutes).
HOMUNCULUS.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Saves as its creator. Telepathic link with creator.
HOMUNCULUS.DESCRIPTION: A small, artificial, winged humanoid constructed by a wizard to serve as a familiar and spy.

HORSE.DESCRIPTION: A common domesticated riding animal, categorized by type (e.g., light warhorse, heavy workhorse).

HYDRA.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Lernaean Hydra: Grows two heads for each one severed unless stump is burned. Pyrohydra: Breathes fire twice per day per head for 8 damage.
HYDRA.DESCRIPTION: A multi-headed serpentine creature that regenerates two new heads for every one that is severed.

HYENA.DESCRIPTION: A common scavenging mammal, often found in packs and associated with the gnoll race.

IMP.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Tail sting: save vs. poison or die.
IMP.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Regenerates 1 hp/round. Immune to cold, fire, electricity. Can only be harmed by silver or magical weapons.
IMP.DESCRIPTION: A small, winged demon, often summoned by warlocks and wizards to serve as a spy or familiar.

INTELLECT DEVOURER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Psionic attack (ego whip or id insinuation). Can take over the body of a victim.
INTELLECT DEVOURER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to normal weapons. Magical weapons +3 or better do 1 damage. Takes 1 damage per die from lightning. Death spell has 25% chance of success.
INTELLECT DEVOURER.DESCRIPTION: A small, brain-like creature that can consume a victim’s brain and take over its body, masquerading as the host.

INVISIBLE STALKER.DESCRIPTION: A powerful elemental creature of air summoned to pursue and kill a single target until the task is complete.

IRISH DEER.DESCRIPTION: A massive, prehistoric species of deer known for its enormous antlers.

IXITXACHITL.DESCRIPTION: A type of intelligent, evil manta-ray like aquatic monster that uses a psychic suggestion to lure prey.

JACKAL.DESCRIPTION: A common scavenging canine, often found in arid regions and deserts.

JACKALWERE.DESCRIPTION: A lycanthrope that transforms into a jackal or a hybrid form, usually found in desert cultures.

JAGUAR.DESCRIPTION: A large, solitary spotted cat, known for its strength and ability to climb and swim.

KI-RIN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Magic use: Spells of all levels at 18th level quality.
KI-RIN.DESCRIPTION: A majestic, benevolent, and highly intelligent celestial creature, resembling a large, winged unicorn or deer.

KOBOLD.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals J, O, Q (x5) in lair
KOBOLD.DESCRIPTION: A small, reptilian humanoid known for their traps, warrens, and worship of dragons.

LAMIA.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Wisdom drain: Permanently drains 1 point of wisdom with a touch. Spells: charm person, mirror image, suggestion, and illusion once per day.
LAMIA.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful, seductive creature with the lower body of a great cat, known for luring travelers to their doom.

LAMMASU.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Clerical spells up to 4th level, holy word, invisibility, dimension door.
LAMMASU.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Protection from evil, +1 or better weapon to hit.
LAMMASU.DESCRIPTION: A benevolent celestial creature with the body of a lion, the wings of an eagle, and a human head.

LAMPREY.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Drain blood for 1-2 (Normal) or 10 (Giant) damage per round.
LAMPREY.DESCRIPTION: A primitive, jawless fish known for its sucker mouth and teeth used to latch onto and feed off of larger creatures.

LARVA.DESCRIPTION: The initial, worm-like stage of development for certain planar evil outsiders, such as demons and devils.

LEECH, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Drain blood: 1 hit point of damage per hit die it possesses, each round. 50% chance of causing a fatal disease.
LEECH, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: Monstrously large blood-sucking invertebrates found in swamps and rivers.

LEOPARD.DESCRIPTION: A common spotted great cat, known for its stealth and ability to hunt from trees.

LEPRECHAUN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Invisibility, polymorph non-living objects, create illusions, and ventriloquism at will.
LEPRECHAUN.DESCRIPTION: A diminutive, whimsical faerie of Irish folklore, known for hiding pots of gold and their trickery.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

LEUCROTTA.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Can imitate the voice of a man or woman to lure prey.
LEUCROTTA.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Kicks backwards with both hooves for 1-6 damage each when retreating.
LEUCROTTA.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous hybrid of a giant badger and a stag, known for imitating human voices to lure prey.

LICH.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Touch causes paralysis. Sight causes fear in creatures below 5th level.
LICH.SPECIAL DEFENSES: +1 or better weapon to hit. Immune to charm, sleep, enfeeblement, polymorph, cold, electricity, insanity or death spells.
LICH.DESCRIPTION: A powerful undead spellcaster who has preserved their soul in a phylactery to achieve immortality.

LION.DESCRIPTION: The majestic king of beasts, a powerful, tawny great cat often found in pride groups.

LIZARD.TREASURE TYPE: B, Q (x10) (Fire), Nil (Giant), J-N, Q, C (Minotaur), O, P, Q (x5) (Subterranean)
LIZARD.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Fire: Breathes a puff of flame for 2-12 damage. Giant: Double damage on a score of 20. Minotaur: Picks up prey on a score of 20. Subterranean: Double damage on a score of 20.
LIZARD.SPECIAL DEFENSES: See below for each type of lizard
LIZARD.SIZE: L (30' long), L (15' long), L (40' long), L (20' long)
LIZARD.DESCRIPTION: A common reptile, including various types like the monitor lizard, often found in warm environments.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

LIZARD MAN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Some use barbed darts (1-4 damage) or javelins (1-6 damage).
LIZARD MAN.DESCRIPTION: A primitive, scaled humanoid race found in swamps and marshes, known for their tribal life and simple weapons.

LOCATHAH.DESCRIPTION: An aquatic humanoid with fish-like features, usually organized in tribes in tropical seas.

LURKER ABOVE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Smother: Constriction for 1-6 damage per round, smothers in 2-5 rounds.
LURKER ABOVE.DESCRIPTION: A creature that clings to the ceiling of caverns, resembling a dark, massive sheet of cloth, which drops onto unsuspecting victims.

LYCANTHROPE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Silver or +1 or better weapon to hit
LYCANTHROPE.DESCRIPTION: A humanoid afflicted with a curse that allows them to transform into an animal (e.g., werewolf, werebear).

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

LYNX, GIANT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Surprised only on a 1. 75% accurate in detecting traps.
LYNX, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: An enormous version of the wild cat, highly dangerous with sharp claws and stealth.

MAMMOTH.DESCRIPTION: A massive, shaggy-haired prehistoric elephant found in cold climates.

MANTICORE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Tail spikes: Fires a volley of 6 spikes for 1-6 damage each.
MANTICORE.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous hybrid with a human-like head, the body of a lion, and the wings of a dragon, capable of shooting razor-sharp tail spikes.

MASHER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Poison spines: 4-8 dorsal spines, 4' long. Save vs. poison or be killed if struck.
MASHER.DESCRIPTION: A large, multi-legged, predatory insectoid creature that relies on crushing its prey with its bulk.

MASTODON.DESCRIPTION: A large, extinct elephant-like mammal, known for its tusks and heavy frame.

MEDUSA.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous female humanoid with living snakes for hair, whose gaze can instantly turn a living creature to stone.

MEN.DESCRIPTION: The common humanoid race, including various classes and professions, ranging from peasants to knights.

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

MERMAN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Some use grappling hooks to slow ships.
MERMAN.DESCRIPTION: A male aquatic humanoid with the upper body of a man and the lower body of a fish.

MIMIC.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Glue: secretes a glue to hold fast any creature that touches it.
MIMIC.DESCRIPTION: A highly intelligent, predatory creature capable of perfectly impersonating inanimate objects, such as chests or doors, to ambush prey.

MIND FLAYER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Mind blast: psionic attack affecting creatures in a 6" cone. If tentacles hit, they draw out the brain in 1-4 rounds.
MIND FLAYER.DESCRIPTION: A highly intelligent, evil, tentacled humanoid creature that consumes the brains of sentient beings for sustenance.

MINOTAUR.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous hybrid with the head of a bull and the body of a man, known for its immense strength and maze-dwelling habits.

MOLD.DESCRIPTION: Various types of dangerous fungal growth (e.g., russet mold, yellow mold) that cause harm when touched or inhaled.

MORKOTH.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Hypnosis: tunnels form a hypnotic pattern, victims are charmed if they fail a save at -4.
MORKOTH.DESCRIPTION: A bizarre, highly intelligent aquatic creature that builds complicated, deadly dimensional mazes to trap victims.

MULE.DESCRIPTION: A sterile hybrid of a donkey and a horse, valued for its stubborn endurance and sure-footedness.

MUMMY.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Fear: sight causes paralysis with fright for 1-4 rounds unless save vs. magic is made. Touch inflicts a rotting disease.
MUMMY.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can only be harmed by magical weapons (half damage). Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis. Takes damage from fire and holy water.
MUMMY.DESCRIPTION: An undead creature, typically the preserved body of a powerful ancient king or priest, cursed with a chilling touch and a fear aura.

NAGA.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Guardian: Poisonous bite, constriction, spit poison, clerical spells. Spirit: Poisonous bite, charm gaze, magic-user and clerical spells. Water: Poisonous bite, magic-user spells.
NAGA.SIZE: L (20' long), L (15' long), M (10' long)
NAGA.DESCRIPTION: A type of intelligent, serpentine creature with both magical and physical prowess, often guarding ancient temples or treasures.

NEO-OTYUGH.DESCRIPTION: A massive, predatory aquatic blob with a huge maw, known for its ability to dissolve prey instantly.

NIGHT HAG.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Casts sleep spell. Can ride a sleeping victim ethereally, draining 1 point of constitution per night. Magic missile and ray of enfeeblement 3 times per day.
NIGHT HAG.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can only be harmed by silver, iron, or +3 or better weapons. Immune to sleep, charm, fear, fire, and cold-based spells.
NIGHT HAG.DESCRIPTION: A hideous, powerful fiend that travels between planes to torment mortals through their dreams, stealing their souls for evil purposes.

NIGHTMARE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Breathes a cloud of smoke, causing blindness and choking (-2 to hit and damage).
NIGHTMARE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can become ethereal and travel the astral plane.
NIGHTMARE.DESCRIPTION: A fiendish, smoke-maned horse from the lower planes, used as a swift, terrifying mount by powerful evil beings.

NIXIE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Charm: generate a powerful charm spell. Can cast water breathing once per day.
NIXIE.DESCRIPTION: A mischievous and often vain female water spirit (faerie) that dwells in lakes and rivers.

NYMPH.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Druidical cleric spells at 7th level. Looking at one causes blindness. If nude, an onlooker will die unless a save vs. magic is made.
NYMPH.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful, benevolent female spirit tied to a specific natural location (e.g., spring, forest), known for their radiant beauty and protective nature.

OCHRE JELLY.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Lightning divides it into one or more smaller jellies, each doing one-half normal damage. Immune to most spells.
OCHRE JELLY.DESCRIPTION: A large, sluggish, yellow-orange amorphous ooze that dissolves flesh and is capable of splitting when struck by lightning.

OCTOPUS, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Constriction: Tentacles constrict for 2-8 damage per round after hitting.
OCTOPUS, GIANT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Ink: Emits a cloud of black ink 4" high by 6" wide, by 6" long to escape.
OCTOPUS, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive marine mollusk with long, powerful tentacles, capable of crushing and suffocating its prey.

OGRE.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals M (x10), Q, B, S in lair
OGRE.DESCRIPTION: A large, brutish, and dim-witted humanoid giant known for its appetite for human flesh and crude weapons.

OGRE MAGE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Magic use: fly, invisibility, darkness, polymorph, charm person, sleep, gaseous form, cone of cold.
OGRE MAGE.DESCRIPTION: A more intelligent and magically gifted version of the ogre, capable of flight, invisibility, and powerful spellcasting.

ORC.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals I; C, D, Q (x10), S in lair
ORC.DESCRIPTION: A brutish, aggressive, and numerous humanoid race known for their green skin, tusks, and warlike culture.

OTTER, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: An unusually large version of the playful, semi-aquatic mammal, known for its sharp teeth and surprising strength.

OTYUGH.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Disease: Bite has a 90% chance to infect with disease.
OTYUGH.DESCRIPTION: A grotesque, three-legged monster with a large maw and two tentacled arms, typically dwelling in refuse heaps and sewers.

OWL, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive nocturnal bird of prey, known for its silent flight and powerful talons.

OWLBEAR.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Hug: If it scores a paw hit of 18 or better, it hugs for 2-16 additional damage.
OWLBEAR.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous hybrid with the head of an owl and the body of a bear, known for its short temper and aggressive behavior.

PEGASUS.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful, winged horse, highly intelligent and often serving as a noble mount for good-aligned heroes.

PERYTON.DESCRIPTION: A monstrous hybrid with the body of a stag and the wings and head of a giant eagle, known for eating human hearts and casting a human shadow.

PIERCER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: 95% likely to surprise, drops from ceiling with +4 to hit.
PIERCER.DESCRIPTION: A conical creature that clings to the ceilings of caverns, dropping onto unsuspecting victims like a falling stalactite.

PIKE, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, carnivorous freshwater fish with a powerful bite, found in deep, cold lakes.

PIXIE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Special arrows (+4 to hit) cause sleep or memory loss. Can cause confusion by touch.
PIXIE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Normally invisible, -4 to be hit. Can polymorph, create illusions, know alignment, dispel magic, and use Otto's Irresistable Dance.
PIXIE.DESCRIPTION: A tiny, winged faerie known for its mischievous nature, illusions, and ability to fly.

PORCUPINE, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Shoot quills: fires 1-8 quills from its tail for 1-4 damage each.
PORCUPINE, GIANT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Quills: any attack within 6' suffers 1-4 quills in return.
PORCUPINE, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive rodent covered in deadly, barbed quills that it can fire at attackers.

PORTUGUESE MAN-O-WAR, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Paralyzation: save vs. paralyzation or be paralyzed and devoured in 3-12 turns.
PORTUGUESE MAN-O-WAR, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A large, floating marine creature with long, stinging tentacles that deliver paralyzing venom.

PSEUDO-DRAGON.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Poison sting: +4 to hit, save vs. poison or enter a state of catalepsy for 1-6 days.
PSEUDO-DRAGON.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Chameleon power: 80% undetectable. Can see invisible objects.
PSEUDO-DRAGON.DESCRIPTION: A small, cute, winged reptilian familiar, highly intelligent and possessing a venomous tail barb.

PURPLE WORM.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Swallow whole on a score of 20 or 4 over 'to hit'. Poisonous stinger: save vs. poison or die.
PURPLE WORM.DESCRIPTION: A colossal, subterranean segmented worm that swallows its prey whole and possesses a paralyzing stinger on its tail.

QUASIT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Claw wounds drain 1 dexterity for 2-12 rounds. Can send out a blast of fear in a 3" radius.
QUASIT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Regenerates 1 hp/round. Immune to cold, fire, lightning. Can only be harmed by magical or cold iron weapons.
QUASIT.DESCRIPTION: A small, winged demon, often serving as a familiar for chaotic evil spellcasters.

RAKSHASA.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Magic use: Can cast 1st-3rd level magic-user spells and 1st level cleric spells. Employs ESP and creates illusions.
RAKSHASA.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to spells under 8th level. Can only be harmed by non-magical weapons or blessed crossbow bolts.
RAKSHASA.DESCRIPTION: A powerful, cunning evil fiend from the lower planes, resembling a tiger with hands that bend backward, known for its illusions and magic.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

RAM, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive mountain sheep, dangerous for its powerful horns and charging attack.

RAT, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Disease: 5% chance per wound of causing disease (save vs. poison to avoid).
RAT, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: Large, disease-carrying rodents that often swarm in sewers and dungeons.

RAY.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Manta: Swallow whole on 10% over 'to hit', tail spine stuns for 2-8 rounds. Pungi: Spines cause death (save vs. poison). Sting: Tail spine paralyzes for 5-20 turns (save vs. poison).
RAY.DESCRIPTION: Various types of flattened marine fish, including stingrays (with venomous barbs) and manta rays (harmless filter feeders).

REMORHAZ.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Swallow whole on a score of 20.
REMORHAZ.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Back protrusions glow cherry-red, melting non-magical weapons and dealing 10-100 damage to creatures touching them.
REMORHAZ.DESCRIPTION: A massive, worm-like creature that burrows through ice and snow, known for radiating intense heat from its body.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

RHINOCEROS.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Charge: double damage. Tramples for 2-8 damage.
RHINOCEROS.DESCRIPTION: A large, thick-skinned mammal with one or two horns, known for its massive charging attack.

ROC.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Swoops down on prey, seizes it in talons, and carries it off.
ROC.DESCRIPTION: A gigantic, mythical bird of prey, large enough to carry elephants and often nesting on inaccessible mountain peaks.

ROPER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: 6 poisonous strands cause weakness (50% strength loss for 1-3 rounds). Drags prey to mouth.
ROPER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Unaffected by lightning, half damage from cold. Vulnerable to fire (-4 on saving throw).
ROPER.DESCRIPTION: A grotesque, rock-like creature with one massive eye and long, sticky strands that paralyze and drag victims toward its mouth.

ROT GRUB.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Burrow into flesh and reach the heart in 1-3 turns, killing the host.
ROT GRUB.DESCRIPTION: Tiny, flesh-eating worms that burrow into living tissue, requiring fire to remove them before they reach the heart.

RUST MONSTER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Antennae rust ferrous metals on contact. Magical items get a saving throw.
RUST MONSTER.DESCRIPTION: An insectoid creature that feeds exclusively on iron and ferrous metals, causing objects to instantly decay into rust.

SAHUAGIN.TREASURE TYPE: Individuals N; I, O, P, Q (x10), X, Y in lair
SAHUAGIN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Unarmed attacks with claws and teeth (1-2/1-2/1-4).
SAHUAGIN.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Keen senses of sight and hearing.
SAHUAGIN.DESCRIPTION: A vicious, fish-like humanoid race (sea devils) that live in warlike, underwater kingdoms.

SALAMANDER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Heat: Spear attack inflicts an additional 1-6 heat damage. Tail constricts for 2-12 damage plus 1-6 heat damage.
SALAMANDER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: +1 or better weapon to hit. Immune to fire.
SALAMANDER.DESCRIPTION: A serpentine elemental creature of fire and heat, found in volcanic and extremely hot environments.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

SATYR.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Pipes can cause charm, sleep, or fear.
SATYR.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Surprised only on a 1, 90% undetectable in foliage.
SATYR.DESCRIPTION: A benevolent humanoid with the legs and horns of a goat, known for their love of music, dancing, and revelry.

SCORPION, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Poison sting: save vs. poison or die.
SCORPION, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive arachnid with crushing pincers and a highly venomous stinger on its tail.

SEA HAG.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Death look: sight causes weakness, save vs. magic or die.
SEA HAG.DESCRIPTION: A hideous, evil aquatic humanoid (a type of hag) known for its ugliness and ability to paralyze with its horrifying gaze.

SEA HORSE, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A large version of the marine fish, sometimes ridden by small aquatic humanoids.

SEA LION.DESCRIPTION: A large marine mammal, usually harmless but capable of defending itself fiercely.

SHADOW.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Strength drain: touch drains 1 point of strength.
SHADOW.SPECIAL DEFENSES: +1 or better weapon to hit. 90% undetectable in shadows.
SHADOW.DESCRIPTION: An incorporeal undead creature that drains the strength and life force from its living victims.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

SHAMBLING MOUND.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Suffocation: if both attacks hit, victim is entangled and suffocated in 2-8 rounds.
SHAMBLING MOUND.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Half damage from weapons. Immune to fire. Lightning causes it to grow 1 hit die. Cold does half or no damage.
SHAMBLING MOUND.DESCRIPTION: A massive, mobile plant creature resembling a mound of rotting vegetation, immune to lightning and capable of crushing and suffocating prey.

SHARK.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Giant Shark: Swallow whole on 10% over 'to hit'.
SHARK.DESCRIPTION: A predatory marine fish known for its aggressive attacks and rows of sharp teeth.

SHEDU.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Psionic abilities: 3 major and 5 minor disciplines. Can cast clerical spells.
SHEDU.DESCRIPTION: A benevolent celestial creature resembling a winged bull or lion with a human head, often guarding temples and portals.

SHRIEKER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Noise: Shrieks when light is within 30' or movement within 10'.
SHRIEKER.DESCRIPTION: A type of sedentary fungal growth that lets out a painful, deafening shriek when approached by light or movement.

SKELETON.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Half damage from sharp/edged weapons. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, and cold-based spells.
SKELETON.DESCRIPTION: A common type of animated undead, consisting of the reanimated bones of a deceased humanoid.

SKUNK, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Squirt musk: blinds for 1-8 hours and causes nausea (50% strength and dexterity loss for 2-8 turns).
SKUNK, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive version of the black-and-white mammal, capable of spraying a blinding, highly noxious musk over a wide area.

SLITHERING TRACKER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Paralyzation: paralyzes sleeping victim and drains plasma from body in 6 turns.
SLITHERING TRACKER.DESCRIPTION: A stealthy, amorphous creature that can flatten itself to the size of a snake to pursue victims through narrow spaces.

SLUG, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Spit acid: 50% chance to hit at 6", spits every other round.
SLUG, GIANT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to blunt weapons. Thick, rubbery hide.
SLUG, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, slow-moving terrestrial mollusk with a corrosive trail of slime.

SNAKE, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, constricting or venomous serpentine reptile, including types like the giant constrictor or spitting cobra.

SPECTRE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Energy drain: touch drains 2 life energy levels.
SPECTRE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: +1 or better weapon to hit. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis.
SPECTRE.DESCRIPTION: A powerful, incorporeal undead creature that haunts lonely places, capable of draining life force with its touch.

SPHINX.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Andro: Roar causes fear, paralysis, strength loss, and deafness. Gyno: Clerical and magic-user spells.
SPHINX.ALIGNMENT: Chaotic good (Andro-), Neutral (Crio-), Neutral (Gyno-), Chaotic evil (Hieraco-)
SPHINX.SIZE: L (8' tall), L (7 1/2' tall), L (7' tall), L (7' tall)
SPHINX.DESCRIPTION: A highly intelligent, usually benevolent creature with the head of a man and the body of a lion, known for guarding secrets and posing riddles.

U.Maps or Magic: 1 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 70%

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

SPIDER.TREASURE TYPE: C (Giant), J-N, Q (Huge), J, K (Large), E (Phase), J-N, Q (Water)
SPIDER.ALIGNMENT: Chaotic evil (Giant), Neutral (Huge), Neutral (Large), Neutral (Phase), Neutral (Water)
SPIDER.DESCRIPTION: A common arachnid, including giant and venomous varieties, often found in webs and dark places.

SPRITE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Sleep arrows: save vs. poison or fall into a comatose sleep for 1-6 hours.
SPRITE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Invisibility at will. -4 to be hit.
SPRITE.DESCRIPTION: A tiny, winged faerie known for their arrows tipped with sleeping poison.

SQUID, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Constriction: Tentacles constrict for 2-12 damage per round.
SQUID, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive marine cephalopod with powerful tentacles and a large beak, capable of dragging victims to the deep.

STAG.DESCRIPTION: A male deer, usually peaceful but dangerous for its antlers during mating season.

STIRGE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Drain blood: drains 1-4 hp of blood each round after hitting.
STIRGE.DESCRIPTION: A small, winged, bat-like creature with a needle-like proboscis that sucks the blood of its victims.

STRANGLE WEED.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Entwines victim, causing crushing damage equal to strength difference.
STRANGLE WEED.DESCRIPTION: A dangerous plant that grows in shallow water, lashing out with vine-like tendrils to drown or suffocate prey.

SU-MONSTER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Psionic attack: psychic crush, psionic blast, or mind thrust.
SU-MONSTER.DESCRIPTION: A small, cat-like creature with a prehensile tail, possessing powerful psychic abilities that drain the mental energy of its victims.

SYLPH.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Magic use at 7th level. Can conjure an air elemental once per week.
SYLPH.DESCRIPTION: A benevolent female elemental spirit of air, often appearing as a beautiful, winged woman.

THOUGHT EATER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Feeds on mental energy and intelligence.
THOUGHT EATER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can only be attacked by ethereal creatures.
THOUGHT EATER.DESCRIPTION: A small, invisible, reptilian creature that feeds on the mental energy (intelligence) of sentient beings.

TICK, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Blood drain: drains 1-6 hp of blood per round after hitting. 50% chance of causing disease.
TICK, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive arachnid parasite that latches onto hosts and rapidly drains blood.

TIGER.DESCRIPTION: A solitary, striped great cat, known for its stealth and immense power.

TITAN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Magic-user and clerical spells of 4th-7th level. Can use symbol spells and unholy word once per day.
TITAN.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can become invisible or ethereal twice per day. Immune to psionic attacks.
TITAN.DESCRIPTION: One of the original, primordial giants, typically possessing divine power and controlling aspects of nature.

TITANOTHERE.DESCRIPTION: A massive, extinct rhinoceros-like mammal, known for the large bony knobs on its snout.

TOAD, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Ice: Radiates cold in a 1" radius for 3-18 damage. Poisonous: Bite requires a save vs. poison or die.
TOAD, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, warty amphibian with a paralyzing or poisonous bite.

TRAPPER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Closes around prey, dealing 4 + armor class damage per turn. Smothers in 6 rounds.
TRAPPER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Resistant to fire and cold (half or no damage).
TRAPPER.DESCRIPTION: A carnivorous creature that lies on the floor of a dungeon, perfectly mimicking stone, wood, or packed earth to trap unsuspecting victims.

TREANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, sentient tree, typically benevolent and acting as a guardian of the forest.

TRITON.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Conch shell horns can calm rough waters, summon sea creatures, or cause marine creatures to flee.
TRITON.DESCRIPTION: An aquatic humanoid race with the upper body of a man and the lower body of a fish, known for protecting the seas.

TROGLODYTE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Revulsion odor: secretion causes strength loss of 1 point per round for 1-6 rounds (save vs. poison to avoid).
TROGLODYTE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Chameleon-like power to change skin color, surprising on 1-4.
TROGLODYTE.DESCRIPTION: A primitive, subterranean reptilian humanoid race known for their overwhelming stench and tribal life.

TROLL.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Regeneration: regenerates 3 hp per round, 3 rounds after being damaged.
TROLL.DESCRIPTION: A grotesque, regenerating giant known for its green skin, long arms, and weakness to fire and acid.

TURTLE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Sea, Giant: Can upset small vessels. Snapping, Giant: Surprises on 1-4, shoots neck out 10' to bite.
TURTLE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Can withdraw head and limbs for better armor class.
TURTLE.DESCRIPTION: A massive reptile, terrestrial or aquatic, capable of crushing foes with its shell or jaws.

UMBER HULK.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Confusion: Gaze confuses for 3-12 rounds unless save vs. magic is made.
UMBER HULK.DESCRIPTION: A massive, four-armed subterranean insectoid creature whose eyes cause confusion in those who meet its gaze.

UNICORN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Charge: Horn strikes for double damage (2-24) with +2 to hit.
UNICORN.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Surprised only on 1, senses enemy at 24", teleport 36" once per day. Immune to poison, charm, hold, and death spells.
UNICORN.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful, equine creature with a spiraling horn, known for its purity, healing powers, and avoidance of evil.

VAMPIRE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Energy drain: touch drains 2 life energy levels. Gaze can charm. Can summon bats, rats, or wolves.
VAMPIRE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: +1 or better weapon to hit. Regenerates 3 hp/round. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, poison, paralysis. Takes half damage from cold or electricity.
VAMPIRE.DESCRIPTION: A classic undead creature that sustains itself by draining the blood and life energy of the living.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

WASP, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Poison: sting causes permanent paralysis (save vs. poison).
WASP, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive flying insect with a painful, often venomous sting.

WATER WEIRD.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Drowning: drags victim into water (save vs. paralyzation to avoid).
WATER WEIRD.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Only harmed by blunt weapons, fire (half damage), or purify water spell (kills).
WATER WEIRD.DESCRIPTION: A malevolent elemental creature composed of animated water, typically found in lakes or deep pools, that attempts to drown its victims.

WEASEL, GIANT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Drain blood: sucks blood for 2-12 damage per round after hitting.
WEASEL, GIANT.DESCRIPTION: A massive, predatory mammal known for its speed and bloodlust.

WHALE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Tail: can smash with tail for damage equal to half its hit dice.
WHALE.DESCRIPTION: Any of a variety of massive marine mammals, including aggressive and territorial killer whales.

WIGHT.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Energy drain: touch drains 1 life energy level.
WIGHT.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Silver or magic weapons to hit. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis.
WIGHT.DESCRIPTION: A powerful undead creature that drains the life energy (levels) of its living victims with a chilling touch.

WILL-O-WISP.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Can grow bright or dim, or blank out its glow entirely for 2-8 rounds.
WILL-O-WISP.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to most spells except protection from evil, magic missile, and maze.
WILL-O-WISP.DESCRIPTION: A small, floating ball of light that lures travelers to their deaths in bogs and dangerous areas.

WIND WALKER.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Wind force attack damages all creatures within 10'.
WIND WALKER.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Ethereal. Can only be harmed by specific creatures or spells like control weather, slow, or ice storm.
WIND WALKER.DESCRIPTION: A powerful elemental creature of air, resembling a translucent humanoid, known for moving at great speeds.

WOLF.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Winter: Frost breath causes 6-24 damage (save for half).
WOLF.DESCRIPTION: A predatory canine, usually found in packs and known for its tracking and hunting skills.

WOLVERINE.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Musk: equivalent to a skunk's musk.
WOLVERINE.DESCRIPTION: A small, fierce mammal known for its aggressive nature and disproportionate strength.

WRAITH.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Energy drain: touch drains 1 life energy level.
WRAITH.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Silver (half damage) or magic weapons to hit. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis.
WRAITH.DESCRIPTION: A powerful, incorporeal undead creature that appears as a dark, shadowy figure and drains the vitality from living creatures.

WYVERN.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Poison: tail sting requires save vs. poison or die.
WYVERN.DESCRIPTION: A two-legged dragon relative with wings and a venomous stinger on its tail, known for its bestial nature.

XORN.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to fire and cold. Half damage from lightning. Can pass through stone and earth.
XORN.DESCRIPTION: A creature from the Elemental Plane of Earth that is capable of phasing through stone and earth, known for its appetite for minerals and gems.

YETI.SPECIAL ATTACKS: Gaze causes fright and paralysis for 3 rounds (save vs. paralysis to avoid). A successful hit with a 20 allows it to squeeze for 2-16 additional damage.
YETI.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Impervious to cold. Nearly invisible until within 10-30'.
YETI.DESCRIPTION: A massive, ape-like creature of the frigid mountains, known for its white fur and paralyzing cold attack.

ZOMBIE.SPECIAL DEFENSES: Immune to sleep, charm, hold, and cold-based spells.
ZOMBIE.DESCRIPTION: A common, slow-moving undead creature, the animated corpse of a deceased humanoid.
